[Chorus 2X: samples from "Still Tippin'"]

"Back then hos didn't want me, now I'm hot hos all on me - I SAID"
"Back then hos didn't want me, now I'm hot hos all on me"
"Back then hos didn't want me, now I'm hot hos all on me - I SAID"

[Mike Jones]
Mike Jones!!
Befo' I came up in the game these hoes didn't show no love
[...]
